feature.label: ClockSystem Exhaustive Exploration Features (Linux ONLY)
feature.description: This feature provides the required core functionalities to perform Exhaustive Exploration from a ClockSystem File. NB: The feature first extracts the ClockSystem Virtual Machine (VM) to the Temp repository of your system. Only to use on Linux Machines.
